note: Metallurgist, tinker, scientist, engineer, AC2VO. Making good choices.

fields.name: Avatar image and background
fields.value: A hand holding a Rubik’s cube; a sketch of people on a couch watching TV.

fields.name: Zombiecube? &y?
fields.value: a.k.a. Rubik's cube, which I solved by becoming something of a single-minded zombie over the course of ~3 weeks in the aughts. My cube solution is the same as “the Petrus method.” I have been &y in the digital world since the days of 2400 baud.
